Cristiano Ronaldo's 'Tears of Gold' – James Richardson's European football papers review video
This article is more than 11 years old
James Richardson returns for 2014's first glance at the best of the week's European football press. Featuring all the fall-out from the Ballon d'Or, which saw a tearful Cristiano Ronaldo collect the prize ahead of regular winner Lionel Messi and Bayern Munich's decorated Frenchman Franck Ribéry. There's also news from Milan, where Silvio Berlusconi began a footballing love affair with new Rossonerimanager Clarence Seedorf, after Massimiliano Allegri's sacking
